channel.title: The 614
channel.description:
I am developing a 614 PVP server.
This is a video of combat (it's old): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ohQ8uDlaOhI
* The server once had 200-1000 players
What it has so far:
[ul][*]Flawless combat system [*]Perfect switching [*]Perfect resting[/ul]
Some highlight features:
[ul][*]Perfect staff of light special [*]All ancient curses work [*]Perfect dclaws special[/ul]
What we're buying for starts:
[ul][*]International (.in) domain [*]1gb ram VPS on a 30mbps d/u speed line[/ul]
I know it sounds "bad" but our server only uses a maximum of ~300mb (~0.3gb) of ram so 1gb is fine for starters. If we need a better host we'll upgrade.
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/switch4way.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/sol.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/resting.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/ancient_magic.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/ancient_curses.gif[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/dclaws.gif[/img]
Hybriding Preview (big gif) http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/hybrid_preview.gif
2000 players online (big gif) http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/2002players.gif
Credits:
[ul][*]light232 [*]dragonkk [*]red hot [*]scu11 [*]canownyoueasy [*]im da baws [*]me! (Richard)[/ul]

item.title: The 614
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Kono-chan:

Don’t really see a point in anything above 600 anymore… Pretty much the same thing as current RuneScape…

EXCEPT U SP0NZORS.
I used to make videos with private servers (not like, ohai this is my bank and pking).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Stating this is or at least part of InnovationX is kind of hard to believe. Tell me, if this is InnovationX whom is one of the programmers, or if there is one?

item.title: The 614
item.dc:creator: @Kewl_Aid Kewl Aid
item.description:
@Kewl_Aid wrote:

[quote=“xxv0iderxx, post:4, topic:382327”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=478128.msg3499224#msg3499224 date=1297607307]
Yeah… You’ve made an bad impression for the first time mate.
[/quote]

Yeah, and first impressions are the most important.
However, I believe by having 100-2000 players was how well the server handled it; lag wise.
If you look at his last .gif image (http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/2002players.gif) it shows his source handling 2000 players, but it will be bullshit if he gloated that he had 2000 players on it if he hosted it. You can fully see the player names blitz with bot and a numeral discount.

I like the development, kiu.[/quote]No it’s completely real it’s still #3 on Locus status page (InnovationX)

Read full topic

item.title: The 614
item.dc:creator: @xxv0iderxx xxv0iderxx
item.description:
@xxv0iderxx wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Yeah… You’ve made an bad impression for the first time mate.

Yeah, and first impressions are the most important.
However, I believe by having 100-2000 players was how well the server handled it; lag wise.
If you look at his last .gif image (http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/614/2002players.gif) it shows his source handling 2000 players, but it will be bullshit if he gloated that he had 2000 players on it if he hosted it. You can fully see the player names blitz with bot and a numeral discount.

I like the development, kiu.

item.title: The 614
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yeah… You’ve made an bad impression for the first time mate. Doubt this server has had 200-100 members on it. Other than that, I think this server should continue. Good luck with the development.

item.title: The 614
item.dc:creator: @Kewl_Aid Kewl Aid
item.description:
@Kewl_Aid wrote:

I am developing a 614 PVP server.

This is a video of combat (it’s old): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ohQ8uDlaOhI

  • The server once had 200-1000 players

What it has so far:

[ul][]Flawless combat system
[]Perfect switching
[*]Perfect resting[/ul]

Some highlight features:

[ul][]Perfect staff of light special
[]All ancient curses work
[*]Perfect dclaws special[/ul]

What we’re buying for starts:

[ul][]International (.in) domain
[]1gb ram VPS on a 30mbps d/u speed line[/ul]

I know it sounds “bad” but our server only uses a maximum of ~300mb (~0.3gb) of ram so 1gb is fine for starters. If we need a better host we’ll upgrade.
